tool_description: Crypto coins API provides crpyto coins in market data.
title: crypto-coins

api_list.name: Getting all coins data
api_list.description: Getting all coins data as json formated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-coins.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-coins.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
